items.title: Passengers will no longer have to take their shoes off at the airport
items.description: TSA will allow passengers to keep their shoes on when they go through the general security line at many major airports across the country.

items.title: ICC issues arrest warrants for Taliban leaders over persecution of women and girls
items.description: The International Criminal Court has issued arrest warrants for two top Taliban leaders

items.title: Texas flooding: Portraits of the victims from 'hero' dad to 8-year-old twins
items.description: Young campers and a dad saving his family were among the dozens killed in the historic flash floods that tore through central Texas over the holiday w...

items.title: WATCH:  Coast Guard rescue swimmer who saved 165 from Camp Mystic speaks out
items.description: Scott Ruskin joined “GMA” to detail his rescue operation amid deadly flooding in Texas.
